attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The technology exists for the Government to attempt to track each and every one of us, for purposes which seem undemocratic at the very least. I propose then that this same technology can and should be utilised to give us REAL Democracy - Direct Democracy - whereby every adult legally resident in the United Kingdom can have a DIRECT  say in the running of this country. Representative "government" is a thing of the past, it is a relic of a time when communication was difficult. We no longer need people to represent us, especially when our so-called "representatives" so obviously, regularly and egregiously abuse their positions of elected (and inherited) power. No more! We can represent ourselves. Direct Democracy - NOW!

rejection.details: The main sentence does not give an action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
